objects.text:
• 3-in-1 Filter System
• Removes Pollutants & Odors
• Quiet Operation (25-44dB)

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern product display for an air purifier. The layout is clean and minimal with a split design: the left side features all textual content and the right side displays a central product image ("product_image"). The topmost text layer ("heading") uses a sleek futuristic font for strong brand presentation. Beneath it, the bold subheading ("subheading") states the product type, followed by a smaller tagline ("tagline") and a benefits description list ("description"). The bold pricing ("price") stands out clearly, while a bright call-to-action button ("cta_button") contains "cta" prompting users to shop. Light gradients and transparent dot animations give a soft, breathable aesthetic.

**Color palette:**
- Light Sky Blue: `#F5F9FC`
- Frost Blue: `#EBF6FF`
- Deep Teal: `#0C4A6E`
- Azure Blue: `#0C80C5`
- Steel Blue: `#0F609F`
- Icy Cyan: `#A5D8FF`, `#7CC2FF`, `#BAE3FF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern air purifier with a minimalist white and grey color palette that reflects cleanliness and advanced technology. The body is primarily a smooth matte white (#F8F8F8), promoting a sense of purity and hygiene. The perforated surface introduces subtle depth through light shadow work. The top section features a deep charcoal grey (#3E3E3E) fan grill, contrasted by soft black (#1C1C1C) on the touch control panel, highlighting interactive elements. Light blue (#71C2FF) and red (#FF4C4C) LED indicators provide a sharp accent and focal point. These high-contrast blends elevate product features while maintaining an overall calm, tech-savvy vibe.
